name: Procedural Swirly Squares 2021.09.21
description: Swirly Squares are short, abstract, animated loops based on black-and-white checkerboards. Each animation explores one visual device by which we might return to a checkerboard after some kind of paradoxical evolution. This particular animation is generative: it will run as a live program in your browser, and display endless random variations of a single visual device.
